discourse_list.title: Draft EIP: parallel system that runs next to the EVM

content.content: This EIP proposes a gasless system for that runs next to the EVM. This system has no native currency so all currencies should be made using smart contracts. The proposed system aims to prevent gas fees using a reputation based system. As an added bonus smart contracts in this system are in python. This is still a work in progress and no where near close enough for production.
content.GPT-summary: The post is a draft proposal for a gasless system that runs parallel to the EVM. The proposal suggests using smart contracts to create all currencies and a reputation-based system to prevent gas fees. The smart contracts in this system are in Python. The proposal is still a work in progress and not ready for production. The post explains the proposal and invites feedback and questions, while also being open to constructive criticism.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: The PR for anyone interested: Add EIP: A parallel system that runs next to the EVM. by JKincorperated · Pull Request #6609 · ethereum/EIPs · GitHub
